title: Cutthroat Cupcakes
description: Killer cupcakesSeems improbable to Lina, but when an attractive detective snaps cuffs on her and accuses her of witchy crimes she's forced to reconsider.The murder weapon? A cupcake topper sold in Lina's shop, Sticky, Tricky Treats.The method? A killing curse.The curse's origin? Lina...sort of.Except Lina hadn't a clue that she was a witch, and certainly didn't know she'd accidentally cursed some of her confections.She's got to catch the killer who used her magic to murder or possibly face a conviction as an accessory. Now, if only the wizard detective assigned to the case weren't such a distraction.Cutthroat Cupcakes is a magical witch culinary cozy with a touch of romance, the first of three books in the Cursed Candy Mysteries series!
author: Cate Lawley
